name: Ligination
description:
LIGINATION

Ligination is a game about a Character named Liam who is trying to get to the end of the level but he starts to get Exhausted over time so he starts seeing enemy's in his way, Liam has to keep drinking Stamina Potions in order to decrease the enemy's he see's, And he also uses his 3 Powerful Guns to destroy his enemy's.

Details:

Game Made with Unity

3D Art made with Blender

UI Art made with Adobe Illustrator

Game by Cottontail Studio

Discord Link

Sorry if the Levels are not good, I ran late on time to submit it!
